skillTree.name: Juggernaut
skillTree.description: Mighty beasts of groaning iron and brass, taller than a man and possessed of a crushing mass.

skillTree.name: Blood Throne
skillTree.description: A mighty Daemon Engine, clad in brass armour and driven into battle on iron-shod wheels.

skillTree.name: Brass Collar
skillTree.description: Few magics can worm their way through this one's skull; their Khornate collar offers adequate protection, as does the impenetrable, relentless fury infecting his mind.

effects.description:
Enemy fire resistance: -5%
	(enemy armies in region)

Enemy fire resistance: -10%
	(enemy armies in region)

skillTree.name: Thick Skin
skillTree.description: At times, this servant of Khorne storms across the battlefield with arrows lodged in his chest. However, they seem to do little but further stoke the raging fire of his wrath.

skillTree.name: Hates Slaanesh
skillTree.description: Fluttering and flouncing into battle is the way of the weak and self-indulgent. War should be waged Kharneth's way – with pure, unbridled savagery.

effects.description: Melee attack: +10 when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
Weapon strength: +15% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions

skillTree.name: Immortality
skillTree.description: Who wants to live forever? As it turns out, most beings wouldn't say no…

effects.description: This Lord will be wounded instead of killed in battle

skillTree.name: Mentor
skillTree.description: Having learned much in their long years of service, this character now turns their attention to training others.

effects.description: Character will share +15% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +20% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +30% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +35% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)
Character will share +50% of experience earned between all other active Lords

Experience gain: +50% for characters
	(Heroes in Lord's army)

Leadership: +1 when in foreign territory
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +2 when in foreign territory
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +1 when laying siege
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +2 when laying siege
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Brutal Charge
skillTree.description: When a huge swathe of rage and violence descends upon the unready, very few survivors are left in its wake.

skillTree.name: Maim!
skillTree.description: No foe remains a threat once torn limb from bloody limb!

skillTree.name: Kill!
skillTree.description: "KILL! KILL THEM ALL!"

skillTree.name: Destroy!
skillTree.description: "Raze it all to the ground! Leave nothing standing!"

skillTree.name: Slaughter!
skillTree.description: With every other thought squeezed from their mind, there is naught left of this one but the screaming song of slaughter.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Murder!
skillTree.description: Death, malice, butchery and murder – the enemies of Khorne shall have it all.

skillTree.name: Hunt!
skillTree.description: "None shall run far! None shall be able to hide! All will come to sufferance!"

skillTree.name: Cleave!
skillTree.description: "Modulistic terror – a vast, sadistic feast. The only way to exit is going piece by piece."

skillTree.name: Crush!
skillTree.description: All will know agony, pulverised by the inescapable grip of the Blood God's hatred.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Inspiring Presence
skillTree.description: There are Lords that radiate power, confidence and fear, inspiring their followers to great or terrible acts.

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +100
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Skulltakers
skillTree.description: The Feet of Khorne march across the corpses of their enemies, as the Teeth of Death crush the life from those yet to die.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Bloodletters of Khorne, Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne and Bloodcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +4 for Bloodletters of Khorne, Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne and Bloodcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +6 for Bloodletters of Khorne, Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne and Bloodcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Bloodletters of Khorne, Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne and Bloodcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Bloodletters of Khorne, Exalted Bloodletters of Khorne and Bloodcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Bloodsoaked Champions
skillTree.description: Still awash with the blood of the conquered, the most devoted servants of war deliver skulls afore the Blood God's Skull Throne.

effects.description:
Armour: +5 for Marauders, Marauder Horsemen, Chaos Warriors, Chosen and Skullcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +5 for Marauders, Marauder Horsemen, Chaos Warriors, Chosen and Skullcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +4 for Marauders, Marauder Horsemen, Chaos Warriors, Chosen and Skullcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Marauders, Marauder Horsemen, Chaos Warriors, Chosen and Skullcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +6 for Marauders, Marauder Horsemen, Chaos Warriors, Chosen and Skullcrushers of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Ferocious Hunters
skillTree.description: A single moment is all it takes to become lost in a vicious maelstrom of wing, tooth and claw.

effects.description:
Speed: +5% for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Forsaken of Khorne and Chaos Furies units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +10% for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Forsaken of Khorne and Chaos Furies units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Forsaken of Khorne and Chaos Furies units
	(Lord's army)

Speed: +15% for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Forsaken of Khorne and Chaos Furies units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Flesh Hounds of Khorne, Chaos Warhounds, Forsaken of Khorne and Chaos Furies units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Hellforged Engines
skillTree.description: The machinery of war creates a symphony of destruction out of booming cannon fire and the creaking of blood-soaked, hellish mechanisms.

effects.description:
Charge bonus: +6 for Skullcannon, Gorebeast Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Chaos Warshrine and Blood Shrine of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +5 for Skullcannon, Gorebeast Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Chaos Warshrine and Blood Shrine of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +9 for Skullcannon, Gorebeast Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Chaos Warshrine and Blood Shrine of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Armour: +10 for Skullcannon, Gorebeast Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Chaos Warshrine and Blood Shrine of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Skullcannon, Gorebeast Chariot, Chaos Chariot, Chaos Warshrine and Blood Shrine of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Harbingers of Death
skillTree.description: Where this Lord's rabid warriors appear, slaughter and Ruination are always sure to follow.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +4 for Minotaurs of Khorne, Spawn of Khorne, Bloodthirster and Soul Grinder of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +6 for Minotaurs of Khorne, Spawn of Khorne, Bloodthirster and Soul Grinder of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +12% for Minotaurs of Khorne, Spawn of Khorne, Bloodthirster and Soul Grinder of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +8 for Minotaurs of Khorne, Spawn of Khorne, Bloodthirster and Soul Grinder of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

Weapon strength: +16% for Minotaurs of Khorne, Spawn of Khorne, Bloodthirster and Soul Grinder of Khorne units
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Khorne's Chosen
skillTree.description: Leaving a trail of carnage and devastation in their wake, Khorne's Chosen are the most fervent acolytes of annihilation.

effects.description:
Melee attack: +5 for Bloodletters, Exalted Bloodletters, Forsaken, Chosen, Marauders and Chaos Warriors of Khorne units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee defence: +5 for Bloodletters, Exalted Bloodletters, Forsaken, Chosen, Marauders and Chaos Warriors of Khorne units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Physical resistance: 10% for Bloodletters, Exalted Bloodletters, Forsaken, Chosen, Marauders and Chaos Warriors of Khorne units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Rush to Slaughter
skillTree.description: Many armies are lost almost instantly under an avalanche of uninhibited, murderous rage. Such things are wondrous to behold.

effects.description:
Speed: +10% for Bloodthirster, Minotaurs of Khorne and Spawn of Khorne units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Charge bonus: +12 for Bloodthirster, Minotaurs of Khorne and Spawn of Khorne units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Missile resistance: 15% for Bloodthirster, Minotaurs of Khorne and Spawn of Khorne units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Overwhelming Stampede
skillTree.description: Into the heart of the enemy race the feral hounds of havoc and destruction.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Chaos Warhounds, Marauder Horsemen, Chaos Knights, Flesh Hounds, Bloodcrushers, Skullcrushers and Chaos Furies units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Melee attack: +5 for Chaos Warhounds, Marauder Horsemen, Chaos Knights, Flesh Hounds, Bloodcrushers, Skullcrushers and Chaos Furies units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Chaos Warhounds, Marauder Horsemen, Chaos Knights, Flesh Hounds, Bloodcrushers, Skullcrushers and Chaos Furies units(Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Forged in Blood
skillTree.description: The diabolic engines of war rumble with the endless wrath of the Blood God himself.

effects.description:
Leadership: +5 for Soul Grinder, Skullcannon, Blood Shrine, Chaos Warshrine of Khorne, Chaos Chariot and Gorebeast Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Bonus vs Infantry: +8 for Soul Grinder, Skullcannon, Blood Shrine, Chaos Warshrine of Khorne, Chaos Chariot and Gorebeast Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

Spell resistance: 15% for Soul Grinder, Skullcannon, Blood Shrine, Chaos Warshrine of Khorne and Gorebeast Chariot units (Rank 7 and above)
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Route Marcher
skillTree.description: Those who know the land and its secrets will travel faster and further than the foes who don't.

skillTree.name: Serve or Die
skillTree.description: "You will serve me, wretch, or you will die, there is no other option."

skillTree.name: Blood Feast
skillTree.description: This Khornate Lord's well of eternal rage never runs dry, nor does the ceaseless influx of warriors eager to serve under his command.

skillTree.name: Despoilers
skillTree.description: To despoil, to corrupt and ruin, to break the mortals and take their gods from them - this is what Chaos wants.

skillTree.name: Corruption
skillTree.description: With the servants of Chaos comes the corruption – as the landscape twists, this one speeds the transformation.

skillTree.name: Unholy Resilience
skillTree.description: This willing servant of the Ruinous Powers has a resilience that is beyond any mortal measure.

effects.description: Casualty replenishment rate: +30% for this Lord

skillTree.name: Lightning Strike
skillTree.description: "The time to strike is now!"

effects.description: Enables lightning strike battles when reinforcements are present

skillTree.name: Sustained by Slaughter
skillTree.description: There is no stopping this one's slaughter, for they are driven by the unquenchable lust for battle.

skillTree.name: Relentless Advance
skillTree.description: Battles can be lost, but can the war ever really be won? The advance of Ruin can never truly be halted once and for all.

effects.description:
Attrition: -10% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -20% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

Attrition: -30% casualties suffered from all attrition
	(Lord's army)

skillTree.name: Call to Bloodletting
skillTree.description: Every skull taken in the Blood God's honour proves this one's loyalty to the Skull Throne.

skillTree.name: Claimer of Skulls
skillTree.description: This brutal Lord of Khorne decimates the lands of man and monster alike – the avatar or wrath incarnate!

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +25% chance of wounding aggressors

backgroundSkills.name: Aggressive
backgroundSkills.description: If you're gonna die, you may as well die with your boots on.

backgroundSkills.name: Confident
backgroundSkills.description: Self-belief is a fine thing when not misplaced.

effects.description:
Experience gain: +5% for units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Cunning
backgroundSkills.description: Deceit is a perfectly acceptable means of attack.

effects.description:
Ambush success chance: +20%
	(armies in local owned region)

backgroundSkills.name: Disciplined
backgroundSkills.description: Always in control, this one leaves no stone unturned and nothing to chance.

backgroundSkills.name: Fleet-Footed
backgroundSkills.description: Being fleet of foot is useful in a fight… or when trying to get away afterwards!

backgroundSkills.name: Intelligent
backgroundSkills.description: Sharp minds make sharp blades sharper still.

effects.description: Hero self-defence: +5% chance of wounding aggressors

Ambush defence chance: +20%
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Knowledgeable
backgroundSkills.description: What this being doesn't know probably isn't worth knowing, so deep is their interest in the world and its ways.

backgroundSkills.name: Strategist
backgroundSkills.description: This being has a plan - not just a game plan, but a master plan to achieve their long-term aims.

backgroundSkills.name: Strong
backgroundSkills.description: Well built, robust. Powerful.

backgroundSkills.name: Tactician
backgroundSkills.description: Careful planning, knowledge of the terrain and the weaknesses of the enemy are the key to victory.

backgroundSkills.name: Tough
backgroundSkills.description: Rugged, resistant, and almost unbreakable, this being can and will take on all comers.

backgroundSkills.name: Weapon Master
backgroundSkills.description: If you can swing, slash, stab, gouge, or shoot it, this warrior has mastered every aspect of its use.

backgroundSkills.name: Perceptive
backgroundSkills.description: Although actually reading minds is not in their skillset, this one has extraordinary insight into the motives of others.

backgroundSkills.name: Murderer
backgroundSkills.description: "Prisoners? What need of them have we? No, kill them all. Do it now. Kharneth demands it."

backgroundSkills.name: Maimer
backgroundSkills.description: If you don't kill them outright, to spill their blood and scar them for life is almost as good.

backgroundSkills.name: Bludgeonous Slaughterer
backgroundSkills.description: "My hammer's a cold piece of blood-lethal steel. I grin while you writhe with the pain that I deal!"

backgroundSkills.name: Bad Hat
backgroundSkills.description: If there's trouble to be had – and by that I mean the worst kind of slaughter – this one will always be at the centre of things, instigating the conflict.

effects.description:
Income from post-battle loot: +10%
	(own characters in province)

backgroundSkills.name: Warriors of Khorne
backgroundSkills.description: For most who worship Khorne, service to the Blood God is simple: you walk a path of absolute violence and commit yourself to slaughter and battle.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Chaos Warriors, Chosen, and Chaos Knights of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

Leadership: +2 for Chaos Warriors of Khorne units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Daemons of Blood
backgroundSkills.description: Through this reputation, and the furious rage of his Daemonic and mortal servants in battle mimicking the personality of their liege.

effects.description:
Upkeep: -4% for Khorne Daemon units
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Murderous
backgroundSkills.description: Kill and never look back!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +1% per rank achieved
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: Oblivion to Slaanesh
backgroundSkills.description: Not worth it!

effects.description:
Weapon strength: +10% when fighting against Slaaneshi factions
	(all units in army)

backgroundSkills.name: No Ambush
backgroundSkills.description: Only fools hide when they should face the enemy.

effects.description:
Ambush defence chance: +20%
	(all units in army)
